casebody.data:
Michael J. FIONDELLA, Jr., Trustee, et al.
v.
CITY OF MERIDEN et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2019

Michael T. Vitali, in support of the petition.

Dominic J. Aprile, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants Harry S. Eberhart, Adele G. Eberhart and Vincent T. McManus, Jr., for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn. App. 552, 200 A.3d 196 (2018), is denied.
